name: Oregon Pinot Noir
description: This Hawaiian Purple Kush and Pitbull cross was bred among the grapes of a respected Pinot Noir vineyard in Oregon. Taking its name from theÂ breeding location and its deep purple buds, this versatile plant gives off the taste of sweet grapes with a spicy hint of Haze. Though a 80/20 sativa-dominant strain, Oregon Pinot Noir gives the effects of a couch-locking indica, providing a noticeable body high best served for nighttime consumption.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Uplifted, Euphoric, Sleepy, Nausea, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Stress, Insomnia, Dizzy
